snippet.title: Nalua Studio Presents - VENGEANCE HUNTERS
snippet.description:
///
Purchase Neo-Geo AES/MVS: https://shop.naluastudio.com/shop/products
///
Twitter: https://twitter.com/NaluaStudio
///
Nalua Studio: http://www.naluastudio.com
///
Discord: https://t.co/RlaX0qQlee
///
Nalua Studio: http://www.naluastudio.com
///
Nalua Studio, a new & independent game development studio, would like to present Vengeance Hunters! An all-new beat'em'up brawler developed for play on Neo-Geo hardware (AES/MVS) and being brought to all modern platforms!!

Vengeance Hunters has an old school look and flair while also using newer game play design methodology. Expect hard hitting moves, ground combos, air combos, OTG combos, comb extensions and a free form Co-Op experience that is focused on producing a fun time for players as opposed to simply trying to remove as many quarters from your pocket as possible.

Vengeance Hunters is also coming to Nintendo Switch, Sony PS4/PS5, Xbox Series S/X and Steam!
*NOTE* Xbox is not listed in the video due to Nalua Studio still working on becoming a dev partner.

Please join us at https://shop.naluastudio.com/shop/products to order your copy of the AES/MVS version. Modern platform versions will be available to wishlist/pre-order later.

Chapters:
0:00 Vengeance Hunters
0:17 Candy
0:40 Golem
0:55 Loony
1:25 Order Vengeance Hunters
